title: Figure, "Partisan on the March", 1919
markings: underside: traces of hammer, sickle, cog stamped in green underglaze; "Danko" (in Russian) impressed in clay on side
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man dressed in boots, heavy jacket, hat, with gun hung over shoulder, in striding pose; in relief on base "1919."

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Partisan on the March", 1919.
1919. Porcelain, enamel, overglaze pigment?. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-119.
